karma.karmastats.good_knockout.desc: Amount of knocked out innocent entities (e.g. villagers, good players).
karma.karmastats.bad_knockout.desc: Amount of knocked out bad entities (e.g. zombies, bad players).
karma.karmastats.saves.desc: Amount of killed/knocked out mobs that were about to kill another one (e.g. zombie hunting a villager).
karma.karmastats.thefts.desc: Amount of robberies (rightclicking a knocked out villager gives you his trades).
karma.karmastats.modified.desc: A Stat that can only be changed by admins with /karma.
lucraftcore.abilities.grab.name: Grab
lucraftcore.abilities.sweep_kick.name: Sweep Kick
lucraftcore.advancedcombat.you_are_grabb: You are being grabbed! Press %s to struggle!
You are grabbing! Press %s to choke them!
commands.superpower.not_living_entity: That entity can not have superpowers!
commands.superpowerxp.failure.widthdrawX: Cannot give entity negative experience points to his superpower
commands.superpowerxp.nosuperpower: That entity doesn't have a superpower!
commands.superpowerxp.cantlevelup: That entity's superpower can't level up!
commands.size.wrongentity: That entity can not change in size!
commands.size.nosizechanger: This size changer does not exist!
lucraftcore.info.modulesettingswrong: Your LucraftCore module settings don't fit the server's ones!
lucraftcore.info.infinity_gauntlet_cast_: You can find this cast in the chest of a blacksmith in a village.
lucraftcore.info.no_perm_ability: §cYou don't have permissions for this ability!
lucraftcore.bed.too_small: You are too small to sleep in bed!
lucraftcore.bed.too_big: You are too big to sleep in bed!
karma.karmastats.ambientKills.desc: Amount of killed innocent mobs (e.g. villagers).
karma.karmastats.goodHostileKills.desc: Amount of killed bad mobs (e.g. zombies) which were killed with a good intention. You increase this stat when you are a vigilante or better.
karma.karmastats.badHostileKills.desc: Amount of killed bad mobs (e.g. zombies) which were killed with a bad intention. You increase this stat when you are a thug or worse.
karma.karmastats.ambientKnockOuts.desc: Amount of knocked out innocent mobs (e.g. villagers).
karma.karmastats.hostileKnockOuts.desc: Amount of knocked out bad mobs (e.g. zombies).
